document.full_text: the toronto raptors showed they still believe bryan colangelo is the man to turn the team around by signing the president and general manager to a multi-year contract extension on tuesday.
document.title: raptors keep the faith, sign colangelo to extension
lines_and_colors: the toronto raptors showed they still believe bryan colangelo is the man to turn the team around by signing the president and general manager to a multi-year contract extension on tuesday.
